$WmMPID_サクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_Normal,Face|Thank you for this hair ornament,
Ryoma. I'll treasure it forever! I am
so lucky to be your little sister...$k$p$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|I am glad to hear you like it. And I'm
sure Father and Mother would have
been delighted as well.$k$p$Sbs1000|
